# UI Components Package

The UI package provides reusable React components that implement the design system tokens and patterns.

## Components

- `Button` - Interactive buttons with multiple variants
- `Card` - Container with elevation and styling options
- `Input` - Form input with labels and validation states
- `Modal` - Overlay dialog component
- `Navigation` - Horizontal or vertical navigation component
- `Table` - Data table with sorting and interaction capabilities

## Usage

```tsx
import { Button, Card, Input } from '@repo/ui';

function MyComponent() {
  return (
    <Card>
      <Input label="Email" placeholder="Enter your email" />
      <Button variant="primary">Submit</Button>
    </Card>
  );
}
```
